case.title: wine.banksy.king krule.
case.text:
they have nothing to do with ths ad, but i figured it would attract someone along the lines of my type. here's what i want:
a really, really good all-nighter from a really, really good guy. no lie. i'm thinking i come over, hop in the shower and then hop in the bed. but what else could we do to make this night a memorable one?
i'm a bbw. you be awesome. your pic gets mine
